query.statement:
SELECT ACC_OCC.UPJANG , SUM(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_AMT) AS OCCUR_AMT , SUM(CASE WHEN ACC_OCC.TAX_CODE = '100' THEN ROUND(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_AMT/1.1) ELSE ACC_OCC.OCCUR_AMT END) AS OCCUR_SUPAMT , SUM(CASE WHEN ACC_OCC.TAX_CODE = '100' THEN ACC_OCC.OCCUR_AMT - ROUND(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_AMT/1.1) ELSE 0 END) AS OCCUR_TAXAMT , SUM(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_QTY) AS OCCUR_QTY , SUBSTR(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_DATE,0,6) AS OCCUR_YYYYMM , ( SELECT UPJANGNM FROM FMS_UPJANG_V WHERE UPJANG = ACC_OCC.UPJANG ) AS UPJANGNM FROM FMO_ACCT_OCCUR ACC_OCC , FMS_UPJANG UJ , FMO_ACCOUNT ACC WHERE ACC_OCC.UPJANG = UJ.UPJANG AND UJ.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_DATE,0,6) BETWEEN #OCCUR_F_DATE# AND #OCCUR_T_DATE# AND UJ.MAIN_UPJANG = #MAIN_UPJANG# AND ACC.UPJANG = #MAIN_UPJANG# AND ACC_OCC.ACCTCD = ACC.ACCTCD
AND ACC.ACCT_TYPE = #ACCT_TYPE#
AND ACC_OCC.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
-- 사업장인 경우 AND (ACC_OCC.UPJANG = #g_Upjang# OR ACC_OCC.UPJANG IN ( SELECT UPJANG FROM FMS_USER_UPJANG WHERE SABUN = #g_EmpNo# ))
GROUP BY ACC_OCC.UPJANG, SUBSTR(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_DATE,0,6) ORDER BY ACC_OCC.UPJANG, SUBSTR(ACC_OCC.OCCUR_DATE,0,6)
